comments:
I'm using Eclipse 3.2.0/EMF 2.2.0.

I tried to create a new EMF Project from the XML Schema 
"TC-1025_schema_2.0_xpdl.xsd" available at "http://www.wfmc.org/standards/docs.htm#Interface_1"
but always get a NPE. Other tools don't complain that the schema is invalid.

Congratulations, you've found our most frequently asked question.  :)

Please see "XSD Model Loading: Crimson DOM Bug, Workaround & Download" at
http://www.eclipse.org/emf/downloads/install.php

Instead of downloading and endorsing the non-buggy Xerces DOM implementation, you could just switch to the 5.0 JRE or IBM's 1.4 JRE, both of which use Xerces by default.
